name: Propeller Venture Accelerator
tag_list: accelerator, techstars, startups, investment, dublin, mentors
overview:
Propeller Venture Accelerator invests in ICT start-up companies. Propeller has taken the successful Techstars model and adapted it for the European market.

The accelerator programme offers the following benefits to start-ups;

€30,000 Euro investment (approx $37,000 USD) Mentorship (over 80 mentors that can guide, advise and open doors) Investor Day (2012 saw investors from Ireland, England and Italy) Free Office Space (3 months during & 1 month after) Service Package (marketing, sales, legal, I.P. and accounting with corporate partners) In total a deal worth €45,000 Euro (Investment and Services)

All this in return for 7.5% equity stake, valuing your company at €600,000 Euro ($740,000 USD)

In a study conducted in conjunction with DFJ Mercury and commissioned by the Kauffman Fellows, Propeller Venture Accelerator was awarded “7th Best Accelerator in Europe”
